title: Brett Gelman (Extended Cut)
description:
When Brett Gelman was best known for playing a jerk on “Fleabag,” fans sometimes approached him with mean things to say. That’s all changed now that his “Stranger Things” character Murray Bauman is seen as a badass. The fourth season of “Stranger Things” is streaming now on Netflix!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
